title: Thieves
lyrics:
Walk in your own shoes
Make all your luck alone
So you can look in the mirror and see
Oh, how you've grown
Singing

Why

Would you give your dollar away

Keep it moving every day

So you're bouncing to the rhythm

Why

Don't you give yourself the start

Nothing fumbling about with the blues



Sing it to me



Every day

Every night

I see a darkness

Just embrace it

Tumbling in style



Every day

Every night

I keep it calm here

Being faced by

The noise around

Oh, everything



Tumbling through all these years

Trying to get away from the cold dark fear

Tumbling now scraped and torn

Like a feather in the wind I see you floating on

The whisper in space

Talking 'bout grace

Walking like a ghost I'm done

I'll be a thief in the night

Running fast before your life



Singing

Why

Would you give your dollar away

Keep it moving every day

So you're bouncing to the rhythm

Why

Don't you give yourself the start

Nothing fumbling about with the blues



Sing it to me



Every day

Every night

I see a darkness

Just embrace it

Tumbling in style



Every day

Every night

I keep it calm here

Being faced by

The noise around

Oh, everything



Why can't you ignore everything

You think you're so

Don't mind me, I'm not [?] today

Take my hand

And walk with me instead

And give me the light

I've mistaken my flows for [?]

And give me the raw aspiration

Stand tall every day

Just to wake up in the morning

With the sun up in my face



So focus on the feeling

Remember that you're breathing

Tell me that you're healing

Don't we know it's a jungle out there



Every day

Every night

I see a darkness

Just embrace it

Tumbling in style



Every day

Every night

I keep it calm here

Being faced by

The noise around



Every day

Every night

I keep it calm here

Being faced by

The noise around



Oh, everything
